Assume there are virus/spyware/malware out there in the web pages.
Here is =
how I would do it using Heritrix.

- Crawl sites and collect web pages.
- H=
eritrix will put crawled content in the "arc.gz" format.
- You'll probably =
get thousands of arc.gz files depending on how much
you crawl.
- Once the c=
rawling is done, Use the arc reader library to write you
own "page visitor"=
, analyze whatever you want.

cheers,
-joe
